entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 11:30 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Light Drizzle
Temperature: 3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 3.0°C
Wind: SW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or snow. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early in the morning then changing to snow mixed with rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches developing early in the morning and dissipating in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
